messages.message: <!subteam^S01DXHX6FPT> could someone provide Metrics app access to 'Shubhu'
Is this urgent? They’re all PDT, so it’ll likely be a few hours before they can help :blush:
We actually can’t selectively do this right now because it requires site admin permissions.

Is this on dogfood or prod? By the July release we’ll have proper permissions in place and can grant access to specific apps at the site level, so this will be fixed in the next couple of weeks on dogfood, and by end of July on prod. If you really need access in the meantime, can I temporarily make you a site admin
